klassets 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Generate quasi Anscombe data sets Type 1

    sim_quasianscombe_set_1.Rd

    Generate quasi Anscombe data sets Type 1

    sim_quasianscombe_set_1(
  n = 100,
  beta0 = 3,
  beta1 = 0.5,
  error_sd = 0.1,
  x_mean = 5,
  x_sd = 1,
  x_dist = "norm",
  seed = 1234
)

    Arguments

    n

    n, default value: 100

    beta0

    beta0, default value: 3,

    beta1

    beta1, default value: 0.5

    error_sd

    error_sd, default value: 0.1

    x_mean

    x_mean, default value: 5

    x_sd

    x_sd, default value: 1

    x_dist

    x_dist, default value: "norm"

    seed

    seed, default value: 1234

    Examples

    
dataset <- sim_quasianscombe_set_1(n = 100)

dataset
#> # A tibble: 100 × 2
#>        x     y
#>    <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1  2.65  4.84
#>  2  2.82  4.04
#>  3  3.19  4.76
#>  4  3.37  4.28
#>  5  3.55  4.05
#>  6  3.61  5.07
#>  7  3.63  4.02
#>  8  3.66  5.10
#>  9  3.75  5.33
#> 10  3.79  4.94
#> # … with 90 more rows

plot(dataset)
